articles.author: Jake Polden
articles.title: Liverpool handed Champions League boost at expense of Chelsea despite European exit - Mirror Online
articles.description: Liverpool were second best in both legs of their quarter-final tie with Real Madrid, who ran out 3-1 winners in Spain before drawing 0-0 with the Reds at Anfield
articles.content:
Liverpool were knocked out of the Champions League by Real Madrid on Thursday.
The 2019 winners were second best in both legs of their quarter-final tie with Los Blancos, who ran out 3-1 winners in … [+2167 chars]
